snippet.title: Bird of Light PC gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Now on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/447010
Bird of Light is an action navigation puzzler where you place bridge tiles to create paths through levels and then run through avoiding obstacles, leaping over chasms, collecting artefacts and figuring out where the hell you are and need to go. Multiple solutions/missions per level. Looks Cute Plays Hard. Also Teleporters.
